00021 
00022 #include <ctype.h>
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 
00027 #include "tooltable.h"
00028 
00029 #define MIN_TOOL_NUMBER         1       /* T01 */
00030 #define MAX_TOOL_NUMBER         99      /* T99 */
00031 
00032 static int have_tools_file = 0;
00033 static double tools[1+MAX_TOOL_NUMBER];
00034 
00035 static void 
00036 ProcessToolLine(const char *cp)
00037 {
00038     const char *cp0 = cp;
00039     int toolNumber;
00040     double toolDia;
00041     
00042     if (cp == NULL)
00043         return;
00044     
00045     /* Skip leading spaces if there are some */
00046     while (isspace(*cp)) {
00047         if (*(++cp) == '\0')
00048             return;
00049     }
00050     
00051     if (*cp != 'T') {
00052         fprintf(stderr, "*** WARNING: Strange tool \"%s\" ignored.\n", cp0);
00053         return;
00054     }
00055     if ((!isdigit(cp[1])) || (!isdigit(cp[2]))) {
00056         fprintf(stderr, "*** WARNING: No tool number in \"%s\".\n", cp0);
00057         return;
00058     }
00059     do {
00060         char tnb[3];
00061         tnb[0] = cp[1];
00062         tnb[1] = cp[2];
00063         tnb[2] = '\0';
00064         toolNumber = atoi(tnb);
00065         if ((toolNumber < MIN_TOOL_NUMBER) || (toolNumber > MAX_TOOL_NUMBER)) {
00066             fprintf(stderr, "*** WARNING: Can't parse tool number in \"%s\".\n", cp0);
00067             return;
00068         }
00069     } while (0);
00070     
00071     cp += 3; /* Skip Tnn */
00072 
00073     /* Skip following spaces if there are some */
00074     while (isspace(*cp)) {
00075         if (*(++cp) == '\0')
00076             return;
00077     }
00078 
00079     /* The rest of the line is supposed to be the tool diameter in inches. */
00080     toolDia = atof(cp);
00081 
00082     if (toolDia <= 0) {
00083         fprintf(stderr, "*** WARNING: Tool T%02d diameter is impossible.\n", toolNumber);
00084         return;
00085     }
00086     if (toolDia < 0.001) {
00087         fprintf(stderr, "*** WARNING: Tool T%02d diameter is very small - "
00088                 "are you sure?\n", toolNumber);
00089     }
00090     
00091     if (tools[toolNumber] != 0) {
00092         fprintf(stderr, "*** ERROR: Tool T%02d is already defined.\n", toolNumber);
00093         fprintf(stderr, "*** Exiting because this is a HOLD error at any board house.\n");
00094         exit(1);
00095         return;
00096     }
00097     
00098     tools[toolNumber] = toolDia;
00099 } /* ProcessToolLine */
00100 
00101 
00102 int 
00103 ProcessToolsFile(const char *tf)
00104 {
00105     FILE *f;
00106     char buf[80];
00107     
00108     have_tools_file = 0;
00109     memset(tools, 0, sizeof(tools));
00110     
00111     if (tf == NULL)
00112         return 0;
00113     
00114     f = fopen(tf, "r");
00115     if (f == NULL) {
00116         fprintf(stderr, "*** ERROR: Failed to open file \"%s\" to read.\n", tf);
00117         return 0;
00118     }
00119     while (!feof(f)) {
00120         memset(buf, 0, sizeof(buf));
00121         if (NULL == fgets(buf, sizeof(buf)-1, f))
00122             break;
00123         ProcessToolLine(buf);
00124     }
00125     fclose(f);
00126     have_tools_file = 1;
00127     return 1;
00128 } /* ProcessToolsFile */
00129 
00130 
00131 double 
00132 GetToolDiameter_Inches(int toolNumber)
00133 {
00134     if (!have_tools_file)
00135         return 0;
00136     if ((toolNumber < MIN_TOOL_NUMBER) || (toolNumber > MAX_TOOL_NUMBER))
00137         return 0;
00138     return tools[toolNumber];
00139 } /* GetToolDiameter_Inches */
